column1: File:The Hobbit - An Unexpected Journey- Sebastian the hedgehog.jpg
Sebastian is the name of Radagasts hedgehog in Peter Jacksons film The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey. Radagast discovers a sickness falling upon Mirkwood while just outside his Rhosgobel one day
column2: seeing several plants and animals that are dead or dying -- Sebastian being one of the latter. He brings the hedgehog back in an attempt to revive him
column3: but none of his home remedies work. In the process
column4: several large spiders begin to descend on Rhosgobel. Radagast decides to use his magic on Sebastian
column5: and when he finishes his incantation of the spell
column6: the spiders return to the Dol Guldur from whence they came. Meanwhile
column8: and he appears completely back to normal.

column1: Sebastian is featured in the figurine "Radagast the Brown with Sebastian" released for The Hobbit Strategy Battle Game
column2: displayed hiding by the feet of Radagast.
